amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-6 to include intensive health care services related to physical therapy for a service-connected disability in the definition of "covered health care services.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cisneros amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Cisneros.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cisneros amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
